trans-unit.source: Expose <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" /> para o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> para o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filhos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: "RibbonGallery" in all cases.
trans-unit.target: "RibbonGallery" em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve a funcionalidade do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto que descreve a funcionalidade do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário exige que, pelo menos, um elemento filho seja selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário para cada elemento filho selecionado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para cada elemento filho que está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário exige que, pelo menos, um elemento filho seja selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
